# GitHub Copilot Instructions for Azure SDK Repository

## Package Index Update Pull Requests

**Do not comment on package index update PRs.** Automated pull requests that update the package index (typically updates to files in `_data/releases/`) are system-generated and should not receive reviews, feedback, or approvals. These PRs are automated version bumps and similar maintenance updates that do not require manual review. Do not add comments, suggestions, or approval reviews to these PRs.
